name: House Bouncers
description:
Keep the party alive and stop annoying neighbors from shutting it down. House Bouncers is a tower defense game where each unit has its own unique abilities and special upgrades. Your job is to build a defense of crazy party members to hold off waves after waves of pissed off neighbors. How long can you stay alive to the rhythm?

Made for Ludum Dare 46 in 72 hours with the theme 'Keep it Alive'

Art & Audio by Markus Øvre (beefbone)

Programming by Andreas Winther Moen (LuckyFeathers)
